detectors.description:
Orbicular.rebase(uint256,uint256,bool) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#98-120) compares to a boolean constant:
	-sub0add1 == false (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#104)

Orbicular.rebase(uint256,uint256,bool) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#98-120) compares to a boolean constant:
	-sub0add1 == true (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#108)
solc-0.6.6 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Variable ERC20Interface._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#5) is not in mixedCase

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#12)
	- Orbicular.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#122-124)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#13)
	- Orbicular.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#126-128)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Orbicular.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#138-140)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#14)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Orbicular.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#130-136)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#15)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Orbicular.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#153-157)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Orbicular.sol#16)
